item.title: Best YouTube channels to learn coding
item.description: Here are some best coding youtube channels to start your coding journey. Wheather you’re begineer or just want to brush up your skills YouTube has everything for you. I have listed few good channel that worth checking out. The list contains General Programming, Game Developement, Web Development, Mathematics, Self Developement, etc. Programming Android Developer Caleb Curry CS Dojo DevTips Edureka FreeCodeCamp.org Gaurav Sen Hitesh Chaudray LearnCode.academy Programming with Mosh Programming Knowledge Telusko The Coding Train The Net Ninja TheNewBoston Traversy Media Graphic Designing Piximperfect DesignCourse Hindi Channels

item.title: Projects
item.description: Cube Escape Game (Unity3D) Cube is escape is simple game in which you have to clear the obstacles and complete the level. Nothing Special…But It’s first game I have made,so special for me. Btw.. You can directly download it from here. PixelSnake Game (PyGame) Yes it’s a Old Snake Game which we used to play on Nokia 3310 (Good Old Days), but this is the PC version.
